publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3131 Roseanna Cunningham: Donation to New Labour From Mr Richard Desmond-That the Parliament deplores the acceptance by New Labour of a Â£100,000 donation from porn publisher Richard Desmond; believes that it is no coincidence that this followed approval by Her Majesty's Government for Mr Desmond's controversial purchase of Express Newspapers; notes with surprise and disappointment the remarks made by John Reid that New Labour does not exercise "moral judgment" over prospective donors; believes that Mr Desmond's titles are demeaning and degrading to women; notes the academic research proving a link between pornography and violence against women, and calls on New Labour to end its relationship with Richard Desmond and return this donation.
S1M-3131 Donation to New Labour From Mr Richard Desmond (lodged on 17 May 2002) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3131 Donation to New Labour From Mr Richard Desmond (lodged on 17 May 2002) Shona Robison*, Christine Grahame*, Alasdair Morgan*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3131 Donation to New Labour From Mr Richard Desmond (lodged on 17 May 2002) Michael Russell*
S1M-3131 Donation to New Labour From Mr Richard Desmond (lodged on 17 May 2002) Kay Ullrich*, Alex Neil*, Tricia Marwick*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Andrew Wilson*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Michael Matheson*
S1M-3131 Donation to New Labour From Mr Richard Desmond (lodged on 17 May 2002) Colin Campbell*
S1M-3131 Donation to New Labour From Mr Richard Desmond (lodged on 17 May 2002) Fergus Ewing*
S1M-3131 Donation to New Labour From Mr Richard Desmond (lodged on 17 May 2002) Irene McGugan*, Fiona McLeod*, Linda Fabiani*
S1M-3131 Donation to New Labour From Mr Richard Desmond (lodged on 17 May 2002) Dr Winnie Ewing*
S1M-3131 Donation to New Labour From Mr Richard Desmond (lodged on 17 May 2002) Brian Adam*
